story.title: How We Met
story.description: The two were introduced just to go out for coffee for fun, but who would have thought...

story.title: First trip with the matchmakers in Da Lat
story.description: Da Lat was misty, romantic‚Ä¶ and cold. But even with freezing weather, we somehow found time to fall for each other between laughs, selfies, and b√°nh tr√°ng n∆∞·ªõng.

story.title: Our relationship started
story.description: She got a birthday cake. I got a girlfriend. Pretty fair deal, right?

story.title: Going out together
story.description: We practically became coffee shop explorers. If Saigon had a caf√© crawl trophy, we'd already be champions.

story.title: Christmas
story.description: Christmas lights, cheesy music, and us pretending not to laugh out loud at the park while holding hands. Totally worth it.

story.title: Our family moments
story.description: Birthdays turned into big family bonding days. Also, more food than we could ever finish.

story.title: Our birthdays
story.description: Romantic restaurants, whispering wishes, and sneakily checking who gave the better gift.

story.title: Going out, a lot
story.description: Caf√©s, food, road trips, music‚Äîwe pretty much dated everywhere except ...the moon.

story.title: Tet 2025
story.description: Wore ao dai and struck poses at B·∫øn Th√†nh like local celebs. Not saying we went viral, but...

story.title: Thailand trip
story.description: Bangkok gave us chaos, Pattaya gave us peace. Both gave us unforgettable memories‚Äîand some hilarious food fails.

story.title: And then I proposed her
story.description: Fancy restaurant, retro vibes, and him nervously trying to open the ring box without dropping it. Spoiler: she said yes.

story.title: Our Best wedding moments
story.description: We channeled our inner Hong Kong movie stars‚Äî80s vibes, drama stares, and outfits that screamed 'main character energy'.
